title: Project Scoping - Cloud Migration
description: A client wants to migrate their on-premise servers to a public cloud like AWS or Azure and needs a quote.

tasks.description: Run a discovery tool on the client's on-premise environment to inventory all servers and their specifications.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales engineer has a complete list of servers to be migrated.

tasks.description: Use the discovery data to estimate the monthly cost of running the equivalent servers in the cloud.
tasks.expected_outcome: An estimated cloud spend is calculated.

tasks.description: Create a quote that includes the professional services hours for the migration project and the estimated ongoing monthly cloud costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive quote is provided to the client.
